summary_text: A professional clown and a self-indulgent count learn to help each other with their problems, but then become romantic rivals.

name: Curiosa
summary_text: A passionate love story set against a backdrop of sexual freedom, loosely based on the relationship between 19th-century authors Pierre Louÿs and Marie de Régnier.

name: Mazinger Z: INFINITY
summary_text: When the evil Dr Hell attacks the Earth, the mighty giant mecha Mazinger Z is formed to stop him.

name: Katie Says Goodbye
summary_text: A kindhearted seventeen-year-old in the American Southwest turns to prostitution to fulfill her dream of a new life in San Francisco.

name: Novaya Zemlya
summary_text: The year is 2013 and, with the abolition of the death penalty, prisons are overflowing across the globe presenting a major problem for the authorities. The solution is to ship a consignment...                See full summary »

name: Kadosh
summary_text: Two sisters become victims of the patriarchal, ultra-orthodox society.

name: The Legend of Suram Fortress
summary_text: A film version of a well-known Georgian folk-tale. A young boy has to be immured into the walls of a fortress in order to stop it from crumbling to pieces.

name: The Man from the Alamo
summary_text: During the Alamo siege, John Stroud is sent to Ox Bow to protect the townsfolk but, following a massacre, he infiltrates Jess Wade's gang of turncoat renegades supporting the Mexicans.

name: King Candy
summary_text: A 17 year old kid tries to stand out in the world and starts a charity, but his ways lead into illegal activity.

name: Ya tayr el tayer
summary_text: Mohammed Assaf, an aspiring musician living in Gaza, sets a seemingly impossible goal: to compete on the program "Arab Idol."

name: Kyun! Ho Gaya Na...
summary_text: A woman decides to marry her childhood friend, after getting her heart broken by her sweetheart.

name: Entre Nous
summary_text: A Jewish refugee marries a soldier to escape deportation to Germany. Meanwhile a wealthy art student loses her first husband to a stray Resistance bullet; at the Liberation she meets an actor, gets pregnant, and marries him.

name: Lerd
summary_text: A drama about corruption and injustice in Iranian society. You are the oppressed, or you have to join the oppressor to survive!

name: Vanquish
summary_text: A mother, Victoria, is trying to put her dark past as a Russian drug courier behind her, but retired cop Damon forces Victoria to do his bidding by holding her daughter hostage.

name: O Pátio das Cantigas
summary_text: A New age remake of a Portuguese classic, Pátio das Cantigas shows the lives of a neighbourhood in the Old Lisbon, including their desires, happiness and sadness, always with a good humour.

name: Burn Burn Burn
summary_text: Following the death of their friend, two girls in their late twenties embark on a road trip to spread his ashes. Seph and Alex take turns driving. Dan is in the glove compartment, in tupperware, decreasing in volume as the trip progresses.

name: Salomé
summary_text: The Biblical story of Salomé, a girl who agrees to perform the "dance of the seven veils" in return for John the Baptist's head on a silver platter.

name: Beauty
summary_text: Portrait of a closeted gay husband/father living a life of quiet middle-aged desperation who becomes fixated on a friend's handsome collegiate son, leading to an incident.

name: Badri
summary_text: Badri (Pawan Kalyan) is an ad agency director whose parents are settled in the USA. He has a love called Vennela (Renu Desai), who is a close family friend of Badri's family. Their parents want these two to tie the knot.

name: The Savage Innocents
summary_text: An Eskimo who has had little contact with white men goes to a trading post where he accidentally kills a missionary and finds himself being pursued by the police.

name: All My Sons
summary_text: During WW2, industrialist Joe Keller commits a crime and frames his business partner Herbert Deever but years later his sin comes back to haunt him when Joe's son plans to marry Deever's daughter.

name: Lavoura Arcaica
summary_text: The young son that ran from his dominant family descends into decadence and then returns to the nest. Tyrannical fathers, incest, fierce family conflicts and an intense visual style to match.

name: The Juniper Tree
summary_text: Margit and her older sister, Katla, flee their homeland after their mother is killed for practicing witchcraft. Needing a place to stay, Katla casts a spell over a young farmer named Jóhann which makes him fall in love with her.

summary_text: International terrorists get a surprise when their cargo turns out to contain living dinosaurs. The army commando team now have to think fast, if they want to prevent the extinction of the human species, instead of the reptiles.

name: Share

summary_text: In early 1900s England, a maid tries to blackmail her master into romancing her when she discovers he murdered his wife.

name: Dark Figure of Crime

summary_text: Corin Nemec (Mansquito, SS Doomtrooper) co-stars alongside Carpenter as TV ghost hunters that enter a reportedly haunted house that may prove to be the death of them.

name: Teleioi xenoi

name: Pete's Christmas
summary_text: A put-upon teen finds himself reliving the same miserable Christmas day over and over again.

name: An Amish Murder
summary_text: A murder investigation in her hometown triggers deep-seated emotions in an Ohio police chief who came from the Amish community.

name: Random Acts of Violence
summary_text: A pair of comic book writers begin to notice scary similarities between the character they created and horrific real-life events.

summary_text: A man and a woman meet in the hospital after their respective partners are involved in a car accident. After learning that their spouses have been having an affair, the two begin one of their own.

name: Pride, Prejudice and Mistletoe
summary_text: Darcy is a career woman who hasn't found love, but her life turns upside down when she returns home to help her mother plan a charity event.

summary_text: When a small town near the Arizona-Mexico border is wiped out overnight, suspicion falls on the lone survivor. But a roll of photos the survivor took that night tells a different story.

summary_text: His life was torn apart when his wife was murdered by Mafia boss Denny. Filled with vengeance, Adam summoned a demon that endowed him with god-like strength so that he might survive his journey through Heaven's Valley.

summary_text: A greedy, manipulative media mogul seeks to capture Celebi for nefarious purposes, using the shape-shifting Pokémon Zoroark to hunt it down.

summary_text: An evil video game comes to life and hunts the group of developers.

name: Murder in Three Acts
summary_text: Hercule Poirot attends a dinner party in which one of the guests clutches his throat and suddenly dies. The cause seems to be natural until another party with most of the same guests produces another corpse.

summary_text: In 1874, after noticing the total lawlessness in Wichita, Wyatt Earp reluctantly accepts the Marshal's job and runs into the worst local troublemakers.

name: The Sisters
summary_text: Three daughters of a small town pharmacist undergo trials and tribulations in their problematic marriages between 1904 and 1908.

name: Is That a Gun in Your Pocket?

name: Dinosaur Island
summary_text: A vacation becomes the adventure of a lifetime as a boy finds himself stranded in a world filled with ghost ships and prehistoric creatures. He embarks on a journey that will change his future forever.

name: Napoleon
summary_text: The adventures of Golden Retriever pup Napoleon and his friend, the parrot Birdo Lucci.

name: Baby It's You
summary_text: In a 1966 New Jersey high school, Jill and new student Sheik from the other side of the tracks make their way in a first love romance.

summary_text: The story of one woman's struggle against a narrow-minded medical establishment.

summary_text: A woman is pursued by her murderous, psychopathic twin sister in the days leading up to their birthday.

summary_text: The lives of an ex-con, a coffee-shop owner, and a young couple looking to make it rich intersect in the fictional and hypnotic Rain City.

name: Return of Sabata
summary_text: The citizens of Hobsonville hire Sabata to rid them of the McIntock clan, who are forcibly and unlawfully taxing them under the pretext of town development.

summary_text: The scion of a wealthy landowner family turns to alcohol and self-pity and slowly self-destructs after class differences force him to break off his relationship with his childhood sweetheart.

summary_text: A fictional account of the lives of the men responsible for the suicide bombings in Casablanca in 2003.

summary_text: The boys from Big Time Rush travel to London for their first international tour and accidentally get involved in a dangerous device capable of destroying the world. Features covers of Beatles' songs, as well as original tunes.

name: Zombie Massacre
summary_text: A team of soldiers who are assembled to help end a zombie outbreak in a Romanian town.

summary_text: Terry is a suicidal voyeur who treats a dying addict to a final binge, but Terry will only do this if he promises to kill him.
